thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com | 2 of 17
thread.title: Sandy Kline
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Sandy Kline

author: Sandy Kline
title: Sandy Kline
text: I like the features of Constant Contact. Others try to get me to switch to Chimp Monkey as being more user-friendly, but I really like CC. Once I figure it out, it has become easier and I think the features are better. This is important to me as only using CC an average of every other month, not a frequent (i.e., reinforcement of continual practice) user. I am happy with Constant Contact
